name: souvlatzidiko-unlocker
description: A modern Steam Achievement Manager built with Electron, React & TypeScript
author: ThomasThanos

scripts.dev: node -e "console.clear()" && tsc -p tsconfig.main.json && esbuild src/main/steam/worker.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node18 --external:steamworks.js --outfile=dist/main/main/steam/worker.js && concurrently "tsc -p tsconfig.main.json --watch" "esbuild src/main/steam/worker.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node18 --external:steamworks.js --outfile=dist/main/main/steam/worker.js --watch" "vite" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && electron dist/main/main/index.js"
scripts.build: node -e "console.clear()" && tsc -p tsconfig.main.json && esbuild src/main/steam/worker.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node18 --external:steamworks.js --outfile=dist/main/main/steam/worker.js && vite build
scripts.release: node -e "console.clear()" && tsc -p tsconfig.main.json && esbuild src/main/steam/worker.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node18 --external:steamworks.js --outfile=dist/main/main/steam/worker.js && vite build && electron-builder --publish always
